subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: C. C. Sabathia became the first 13-game winner in the major leagues despite another shaky start last night, getting help from Grady Sizemore’s long tie-breaking home run in the Cleveland Indians’ 7-5 victory against the host Texas Rangers.
